extends PromotablePiece
    A Class representing a rook in a game of shogi.

        public Rook(int x,
    int y,
    int allegiance)
        Constructs a rook at a given x and y-value, with the given allegiance.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-value at which this rook is located.
        y - The y-value at which this rook is located.
        allegiance - The allegiance of this rook.

    • Method Detail

      • isValidMove

        protected boolean isValidMove(GameState state,
                  int x,
                  int y)
        Checks whether this Rook can move to a given location.
        Specified by:
        isValidMove in class PromotablePiece
        Parameters:
        state - The state of the game at this time.
        x - The x-value of the target tile.
        y - The y-value of the target tile.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this Rook can move to the target tile.

      • promote

        protected Piece promote()
        Returns the Piece this rook promotes to. Creates a PromotedRook with the same allegiance and location as this rook.
        Specified by:
        promote in class PromotablePiece
        Returns:
        The PromotedRook equivalent of this Rook.

      • demote

        protected Piece demote()
        Returns the piece this Rook demotes to. As rooks are not a promoted piece, demoting them has no effect.
        Specified by:
        demote in class PromotablePiece
        Returns:
        This Rook.
